alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 1:51PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Broward County through 215 PM EDT... At 151 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Intersection I-75 And Griffin Road, or near Pembroke Pines. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pembroke Pines, Miramar, Davie, Sunrise, Miami Gardens, Weston, Cooper City, Royal Palm Ranches, Sunshine Acres, Intersection I-75 And Griffin Road, Miramar Parkway And University Drive and Pine Island Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
